name: YouTube - Better Player Color 2016 (ARC)
description: <mark>If you are using my youtube theme, do not install blue style. Because blue is included.</mark>
additional_info: Version 1.01 (Update 2) (03/2016) - fixed code Version 1.01 (Update 1) (03/2016) - fixed volume slider color Version 1.01 (12/2015) - select color (blue or green) Version 1.00 (12/2015) - better progress bar style If u want this player style, check here: https://userstyles.org/styles/122093/youtube-better-player-2016-arc Check my awesome youtube theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/123887/youtube-shadow-blue-theme-2016-arc
